heading: State-of-the-Art Manufacturing
content: Our factory is equipped with the latest Milacron injection molding machines, ensuring high-quality PET preforms with smooth finishes, uniform wall thickness, and superior clarity.

heading: High Production Capacity
content: With a production capacity of 80 million preforms per month, we cater to both local and international markets, ensuring consistent supply and efficient manufacturing.

heading: Stringent Quality Control
content: We adhere to ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45001, and ISO 22000 certifications, implementing strict quality assurance measures to produce preforms that meet global standards.

heading: Innovative and Sustainable Solutions
content: We continuously invest in R&D to develop innovative, lightweight preforms that maintain strength while reducing material use, supporting sustainability in plastic packaging.
